title: Norimono Man: Mobile Land no Car-kun
synopsis: The anime will depict various vehicles as characters in the "Mobile Land" island. The protagonist Car-kun arrives at the island as a delivery worker. Through his deliveries, he gets to know the residents of Mobile Land, all while following traffic rules and having his deliveries stopped by the meddling Sabibi.
staff: [['Sasaki, Shinobu', ['Director']], ['Koizumi, Kisuke', ['Sound Director']], ['Narita, Yoshimi', ['Series Composition']], ['Watanabe, Cheru', ['Music']]]
